quotes.blunt: So let's recap. If I admit that I am in love - sorry, head over heels in love with Satan and all his little wizards - then you will remove my testicles with a blunt instrument resembling some kind of gardening tool and roast them over a large fire. Whereas if I don't admit that I'm in love with Satan and all his little wizards, you will hold me upside down in a vat of warm marmalade...AND remove my testicles with a blunt... oh I see.
quotes.concrete: I may have the body of a weak and feeble woman, but I have the heart and stomach of a concrete elephant.
quotes.contrafibularity: Oh, well, in that case, sir, I hope you will not object if I also offer the Doctor my most enthusiastic contrafibularities.
quotes.cowpats: The path of my life is strewn with cowpats from the Devil's own satanic herd.
quotes.fork: They do say, Mrs M, that verbal insults hurt more than physical pain. They are, of course, wrong, as you will soon discover when I stick this toasting fork into your head.
quotes.gargantuan: Field Marshal Haig is about to make yet another gargantuan effort to move his drinks cabinet six inches closer to Berlin.
quotes.guilty: The suspect has his head placed upon a block, and an axe aimed at his neck. If the man is guilty, the axe will bounce off his neck — so we burn him. If the man is not guilty, the axe will simply slice his head off.
quotes.jumping: Am I jumping the gun, Baldrick, or are the words 'I have a cunning plan' marching with ill-deserved confidence in the direction of this conversation?
quotes.madman: He’s madder than Mad Jack McMad, the winner of last year’s Mr Madman competition.
quotes.milkman: And which Pitt would this be? Pitt the Toddler? Pitt the Embryo? Pitt the Glint in the Milkman's Eye?
quotes.mouse: I'm as poor as a church mouse, that's just had an enormous tax bill on the very day his wife ran off with another mouse, taking all the cheese.
quotes.mrbrain: The eyes are open, the mouth moves, but Mr Brain has long since departed, hasn’t he, Percy?
quotes.omnibus: Baldrick, I want you to take this and go out and buy a turkey so large, you'd think its mother had been rogered by an omnibus.
quotes.oxford: As cunning as a fox who's just been appointed Professor of Cunning at Oxford University?
quotes.pencil: Baldrick, believe me, eternity in the company of Beelzebub and all his hellish instruments of death will be a picnic compared to five minutes with me - and THIS pencil.
quotes.porn: A man may fight for many things. His country, his principles, his friends. The glistening tear on the cheek of a golden child. But personally, I'd mud-wrestle my own mother for a ton of cash, an amusing clock and a sack of French porn.
quotes.renaissance: To you, Baldrick, the Renaissance was something that just happened to other people, wasn't it?
quotes.rhinoceros: I couldnt be more petrified if a wild Rhinoceros had just come home from a hard day at the swamp and found me wearing his pyjamas, smoking his cigars and in bed with his wife.
quotes.subtle: Baldrick, you wouldn’t recognise a subtle plan if it painted itself purple and danced naked on a harpsicord singing 'subtle plans are here again'.
quotes.tombstone: I think I'll write my tombstone - 'Here lies Edmund Blackadder, and he's bloody annoyed'.
quotes.vikings: There hasn’t been a war run this badly since Olaf the hairy, King of all the Vikings, ordered 80,000 battle helmets with the horns on the inside.
quotes.wit: No, this is a different thing. It's spontaneous and it's called wit.
